en-US.summary: Learn fun facts about badass women.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask badass women facts for a fact
Alexa tell badass women facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Badass Women Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for Badass Woman Facts, and be reminded just how awesome women are.

Badass Women Facts provides you with remiders of the accomplisments and sass from women aroudn the world.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Badass Woman Facts" or "Alexa, open Badass Woman Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
